Number Theory, Combinatorics, & Special Functions

Conference in honour of 70th birthday of Prof. A. K. Agarwal

Symposia on Applied Mathematics and Engg. Mathematics

About the Conference

School of Mathematics and Computer Applications, Thapar University, is organizing the XII Annual conference of Society for Special Functions and their Applications. This Conference will provide a common platform for interaction, exchange of ideas and latest development in the field of Special Functions and various related fields of Mathematical Sciences. The day to day activities during the conference are designed to be interactive, involving sessions like plenary lectures, invited talks and paper presentation sessions, covering a wide range of topics including Fractional Calculus, Number theory, Combinatorics, Special Functions, Lie Theory, Orthogonal Polynomials, q-Theory etc.

Call for Papers

The organisers of conference invite papers for presentations (Oral /Poster).

Important Dates

Last date to send abstract of papers (for contributed talk Oral/Poster) : September 03, 2019

Acceptance of contributed talk (Oral/Poster) : September 07, 2019

Last date to register (Oral/Poster/participation): September 10, 2019

Speakers

  • Prof. A K Agarwal - Panjab University
  • Prof. S Bhargava - University of Mysore
  • Prof. S D Adhikari - HRI Allahabad
  • Prof. K Chakraborty - HRI Allahabad
  • Prof. U K Anandavardhanan - IIT Bombay
  • Prof. B N Waphare - Pune University
  • Prof. M A Pathan - Aligarh Muslim University
  • Prof. S N Singh - Dept. of Sci. & Tech.
  • Prof. A Dixit - IIT Ghandinagar
  • Prof. R Barman - IIT Guwahati
  • Prof. N Saikia - Rajiv Gandhi University
  • Prof. A Shukla - SVNIT, Surat
  • Prof. T Chatterjee - IIT Ropar
  • Prof. S N Fathima - Pondicherry University
  • Prof. K R Vasuki - University of Mysore

    • Organizers

  • Dr. Meenakshi Rana
  • Dr. Jatinderdeep Kaur
  • Dr. Kavita Goyal
  • Dr. Amrik Sen

    • Contact
    For further information or queries, contact the local organizers at ntcsf2019@thapar.edu

    or call at following phone number(s): Dr. Meenakshi Rana (+91 96460 14128)
